description:
http://anidb.net/ch2075 [Hakufu]`s master from when she was a child. He also trained http://anidb.net/ch2097 [Ukitsu] and http://anidb.net/ch16367 [Hakugen]. He is an old friend of http://anidb.net/ch2101 [Goei]`s, and helps her accept Hakufu`s fate.
He revives Hakufu after her initial defeat by http://anidb.net/ch2096 [Sousou]
name: Choukou Shikou
